website_summaries.verdict: Well-organized nut driver set offered at a nice price point. Good collection of different driver sizes.
pros: Nicely sized case that will fit inside large toolboxes
Also includes bit drivers, making this 70-piece set an excellent value
Set ships with a driver handle that uses 1/4-inch shank and offers a soft, comfortable grip
All pieces fit perfectly inside the included box
Highly trusted brand name in tools
cons: For those who don't need screwdriver bits, this set may be overkill

customer_reviews.title: More Specs
customer_reviews.text: Package says: Made in Taiwan All 6pt sockets, which is better in my opinion. I wish they would ditch the really small sockets and instead put in a spark plug socket and one longer extension. 1/4": SAE: 5/32, 3/16, 7/32, 9/32, 5/16, 3/8 Metric: 5,6,7,8,9,10,11 3/8": SAE: 7/16, 1/2, 9/16, 5/8, 11/16, 3/4, 13/16, 7/8 Metric: 12, 13, 14, 15, 16, 17, 18, 19 Ratchet, 3/8" drill adaptor, 3" extension, 3/8 to 1/4 adaptor.
customer_reviews.author: Tool Enthusiast Guy

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a better product than Craftsman and Husky and also ...
customer_reviews.text: Wow! This was much nicer than I expected. Seems like a better product than Craftsman and Husky and also comes with the same guarantee. Stop comparing to other products and just buy this!
customer_reviews.author: Storm

customer_reviews.title: Great Set!
customer_reviews.text: They look very nice, they come in a great container, and they lock together well. The only possible con is that the finish may wear off. It seems like the tools have a dipped chrome (they are not solid chrome) and it may wear over time. This will not affect the tool's functionality, just the look. They would just be a little better of they came as a brushed chrome instead for appearance sake.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey W.

customer_reviews.title: Great setup.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a guy that has every tool so its hard to please me when it comes to them. I love the feel of the driver and shaft length. The assortment is a perfect mix without bits that you would never use. I am also not fond of cases but this one has them organized so good that I will leave it right there keeping everything well organized for the next use. I highly recommend this from the beginner to the expert. Would make a great gift.
customer_reviews.author: C. Dale

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful craftsmanship. Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Nice ratchet. Good feeling. Looks amazing and I kept the case as it goes in my tool drawer nicely. This would make a great gift as it's in an awesome box to that can be reused. Ppl with tools always need storage and prefer organisation. Even if it's not used :) . Teeth click nicely even with quick unfastening movements and it doesn't Skip around much. Hate to admit it but it's the best one I have. But I won't use it for really hard stuck on bolts because I don't know how the ratchet would respond. Typically I find it's the stuck on bolts that damage these ratchets quick where they never work perfect again.
customer_reviews.author: S. Short

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice to have. Have a good enough selection for most use. The handle has a good feel to it and the case is fantastic. Dewalt satisfies me again. All the socket goes into and out of its slot very easily. I hate cases that makes it hard for you to take in and out. Attachments are great. Nothing to complain about. If I have something I would like or be picky about, it would be the writing could be easier to read. Other than that a very good product. feels good to carry it around.
customer_reviews.author: mikeonephoto

customer_reviews.title: Well organized fits most everything
customer_reviews.text: This works well. The heads are organized and easy to put away. I bought this for the driver. I wanted the driver to be manual and function more like a standard screwdriver. It works well for this. My only complaint is that in some cases the driver head is to big around to fit in certain places. This is very rare but when it does happen it is a pain in the ass. I don't fault the company for this though, has to be part of the design.
customer_reviews.author: Trashy

customer_reviews.title: Seems strong. Seems more expensive then it was.
customer_reviews.text: I literally beat this with a hammer trying to unfreeze a bolt. Then my neighbor used them to do front breaks on his sons car. Not only did thy do the job but did it without any issues. Not to mention the case allows me to make sure i don't forget to put anything back. I have gone through way to many mid priced ratchet sets in the past. I have a good feeling this set will be around for a LONG LONG time =) It performs and feels like it cost much more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great set like my other review this will go hand-in ...
customer_reviews.text: Great set like my other review this will go hand-in hand with my DEWALT DWMT73807 Accessory Tool Kit set of extensions. Carrying case is perfect and both cases ATTACH and LOCK together for easier storage and carrying. Perfect for any day-today mechanic use. This is also a perfect gift set. Just watch between standard and metric sizes when buying. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Eric Yonick

customer_reviews.title: The storage box is a joke.
customer_reviews.text: It's 3 times large than it needs to be and takes up way too much space in a tool box. Fortunately the insert can be taken out and I can use the box for other things but the nut drivers don't have a rubber holder so I have to buy a separate box for them and will have to hunt and peck for the one I want when I need to use them. Otherwise, it's fine for around the house stuff, better quality than most. Sorry about the run on sentence.
customer_reviews.author: John Smith

customer_reviews.title: GREAT SCREWDRIVER KIT!!
customer_reviews.text: This kit is complete with different bits, drivers, and etc. Underneath the screwdriver you can store extra ratchets or smaller items. This case connects to similar Dewalt cases easily. You also have the option of removing the tray and placing it in your cart. This would allow you to use the case for practically anything!
customer_reviews.author: Giordano A. Morales

customer_reviews.title: Picked it up on sale...
customer_reviews.text: Giving this a solid four stars. The ratcheting on the wrench is great, very fine (about 72 points) and the latch for on/off (righty-tighty, lefty-loosey) works great and is solid. Contains many of the needed bits (6 points, woo-hoo!) in both metric and imperial (aka English for you yanks). What I find most useful is that it came with a 6 point adapter for the 3/8 sockets. This means I can easily throw that bit into my Dewalt drill and then add on the needed socket for some quick use. What I don't like is that the 10mm (or thereabouts) is on a 1/4" socket and requires the adapter.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Mrowczynski

customer_reviews.title: Not quite it
customer_reviews.text: This tool set was inexpensive but proved rather less than I expected. It's inconvenient to use because of all the small bits and they must be chosen separately and fitted individually. However, it is a nice little kit to have handy and I will keep it near my other tools. Had this come with a power driver it would be easier to use and to own. I'm not entirely disappointed with it but it's not quite what it could be.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Clean

customer_reviews.title: Very nice set
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and I like that they stand upside down in the case so you can take your bolt and simply drop it in the end of each socket if your not sure of the exact size before you even have to pull it out of the container. Also...I like that they are just sitting in their place and not held in tight with a plastic on both sides like many other sets, which make them a pain to get out. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Liendeni

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT ratchet and NOT Magnetic
customer_reviews.text: This driver set, by Taiwanese tool maker Dewalt, feels very sturdy and is packaged well. The case is well designed and the driver/grip and bits seem of quality. However, a big design flaw is it does not ratchet. That's odd and pointless for a socket set. Additionally, it is not magnetic and the bits do not click/hold very well. Overall a poor product and already need to replace it with a better designed set. Not sure how Dewalt is successful selling this set.
customer_reviews.author: Eleven

customer_reviews.title: Great quality great price
customer_reviews.text: I brought three separate sets different measurements. They are all solidly-built very well-constructed and will last a long time. Very happy with the way the cases can lock together to be carried as one big set or detached and carried separately. I also like the way the sockets are faced out words so you can see the opening and match nut sizes without taking them out.
customer_reviews.author: todd evans

customer_reviews.title: Great value and useful sizes.
customer_reviews.text: Had to replace my alternator and this set was perfect for the job. It had all the correct sizes for the bolts and nuts of various parts. Also strong enough not to break under pretty heavy pressure when removing some really corroded pieces. Carrying case is also high quality. You really cannot beat this price. At any other store you will like pay double if not more for something similar.
customer_reviews.author: Landon

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Deal! Save your money and time. Just get them.
customer_reviews.text: For years, I've used work-around toos, or borrowed someone else's set. I never wanted to buy my own given I don't use them too often. But a few car repairs and household repairs later, I thought, "I need a set at home". Got these because they were a cheap set and a reputable brand, and WOW these are quality. Best set I've ever used. These tools are one of those super nice tools where you start finding excuses to fix things with them. Save your money, save your time, get these.
customer_reviews.author: FriendlyNeighborhoodGamer

customer_reviews.title: Affordable, durable, mainly used for car repair
customer_reviews.text: Overall an amazing set, performed my first DIY car repair with this (replaced water pump on a 06' Toyota). Can be a bit bulky and awkward to work with in tight spaces within engine bay. This set can also take a beating, I don't recall how many times i've dropped it but it keeps on cranking. Again, overall it's a great tool, worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Meeche

customer_reviews.title: So good I gifted a set
customer_reviews.text: I've been very happy with this set. Great durability. The print on the drivers is clear. This was exactly what I needed and has been extremely helpful around the house. So helpful I got a set as a fathers day gift.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew T Logan

customer_reviews.title: Not magnetic.
customer_reviews.text: It has a nice selection to choose from. I typically give Dewalt products 5 stars, but this set didn’t have the magnetic bits that holds the screws. It is useless when using for repairmen who work In complicated tight areas. It would have been a 5 if it had the magnet component the the kit.
customer_reviews.author: Paige Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Working as expected
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for working around the house and tinkering with my vehicle. The case is fantastic and compact. The items inside all feel solid and well built. Working as expected. DEWALT is a brand my dad trusted and I am following his example.
customer_reviews.author: m.

customer_reviews.title: The ratchet is one of the best ratchets I have gotten in a tool set before ...
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed by the quality of these tools, they are very well made. The ratchet is one of the best ratchets I have gotten in a tool set before also. Well worth the price for this kit. The cases are also sturdy and latch together with each other. Would definitely recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Michrn83

customer_reviews.title: He loved it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my significant other. Dewalt is the best brand, he says. The longevity of this tool kit amazes me since my s.o works construction building homes. He usually loses sockets but he has really taken care of this toolbox and he told me his fingers dont get pinched when grabbing a piece out so it's easier for him to take out and put them back in. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: The tools are great and look very durable
customer_reviews.text: I had an issue with the first set as the adapter was not cut correctly so when I attached it to the ratchet it got stuck. I immediately received a replacement which was perfectly cut. The tools are great and look very durable. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Great Set, Clearly Quality, Just Not What I Needed
customer_reviews.text: Great socket set. Looked to have everything I might need, and it almost did. Still looking for one more socket. lol That's okay. Good price, great quality so I'm keeping it. I'm sure this set will help with my lawn tractor maintenance, just not big enough for blade removal. Missing that one important size. Good thing I was rescued by my kind landlord. He had what I needed and changed my blades for me too. Lucky me!
customer_reviews.author: don't you wish you knew

customer_reviews.title: They have everything most people will ever need.
customer_reviews.text: It's worth having the whole set just to avoid those times when you can't screw or unscrew something (or drill or undrill something). Definitely worth the money in time savings. Only gripe is that they didn't put in a T50 torque bit, kind of a lazy oversight.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Blow

customer_reviews.title: Tool set I needed, but in a case that's absurd overkill
customer_reviews.text: For the next set of ratchet wrenches you want to survive a nuclear meltdown, consider this set. The tools - just what I wanted. The case - exactly what I don't want. In a world of plastic waste, here we have an almost-indestructible, 4x thickness plastic box, which will of course break at its weakest point, and render the whole thing a trap for sea turtles or "food" for birds. Really, isn't it about time to package things differently?
customer_reviews.author: bikebeach

customer_reviews.title: Good for what it is
customer_reviews.text: Decent starter set, used to keep it in car. Switched it out for the EPAuto 69pc set... this Dewalt set is missing too many things for getting any moderately difficult automotive issues resolved resulting in me buying more sets and grabbing tools from the house
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mostly decent
customer_reviews.text: Most of the parts are good, however there seems to be something wrong with the included driver handle. None of the bits fit into it. I suspect a manufacturing flaw, however since I don't care about it that much I haven't asked for a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Brown

customer_reviews.title: Lifetime Warranty with Imperial and Metric
customer_reviews.text: DEWALT makes some really good tools. These are no exception. It has every standard metric and imperial socket size, and has a drill extension as well. The driver is very sturdy and the lifetime warranty is even better. Look no further than this set.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan

customer_reviews.title: High quality product
customer_reviews.text: Love my new Dewalt socket set! First it comes in a sturdy case that has several clips to keep the pieces in their proper place, as well as a sturdy carry handle. The ratchet feels solid, and it easily changes direction as needed.
customer_reviews.author: Earl

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a great price!!
customer_reviews.text: what a fantastic product! very durable at a great price then add in the lifetime replacent and you can’t go wrong! my son is a mechanic and when i asked him what i should get for a socket set and this is the brand that he recommended. You will not regret purchasing this product!
customer_reviews.author: Talo Running-Wolf

customer_reviews.title: nice but
customer_reviews.text: nice set but not magnetic and I really didn't need the bits I just wanted a good nut driver set
customer_reviews.author: Average Guy

customer_reviews.title: Everything you need
customer_reviews.text: This is a really solid high quality socket set. DeWalt makes a good product. I needed bigger sockets and the sets I had were kind of a mess so I just bought a whole new set and this one has everything you should need.
customer_reviews.author: Matthieu Genay

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and nice packaging. Very useful set of screw drivers. Made in Taiwan
customer_reviews.author: NN

customer_reviews.title: JUST RECEIVED TODAY - LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: I love tools! And as soon as I got it I was showing everyone how pretty it was, just like a women would show off her new purse :) I used it right away it worked beautifully! My friend liked it so much I ordered one for him :)
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: its OK
customer_reviews.text: It’s a pretty complete set. The handle looks well anchored, and the grip is good. The only real down side is the bit locking scheme, it uses wire spring to hold the bits in which make the smaller bits harder to change than they should be and I got believe it will be the first thing to fail. A magnetic set up would last longer and help with the holding of any fasteners used.
customer_reviews.author: FR

customer_reviews.title: Great set for a good price at $25
customer_reviews.text: high quality set of sockets/ratchet/case. Ratchet is a little too bulky/heavy, but I am not using it everyday professionally. Got it for 25 dollar, and it's much better than what you can buy at the Autozone for $15.
customer_reviews.author: Ye L.

customer_reviews.title: Quality socket set
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace a cheap socket set that I kept in my truck. The quality of this set is very good. It has a nice selection of sockets and the case makes it easy to stow. If you’re looking for a nice socket set this one is a excellent choice.
customer_reviews.author: Uppy

customer_reviews.title: Top-notch sockets and handle
customer_reviews.text: This is a very high-quality product. The latches are pretty difficult to open and close, but the tools inside are top-notch. The ratchet handle is very comfortable, and the sockets pop on and off very easily when the center button on the handle is depressed.
customer_reviews.author: Wordwrkr

customer_reviews.title: Tool great care subpar.
customer_reviews.text: The tool itself feels great and study. Feels like it'll last at least a couple decades. The case it came in is thin plastic that won't last it's first decade. Take that for what's it's worth m.
customer_reviews.author: Artur

customer_reviews.title: DEWALT SCREW DRIVER SET
customer_reviews.text: THIS SET IS NOT MAGNETIC SO THE SCREW BITS WILL JUST FALL OUT OF THE HANDLE ,-USELESS VERY UNHAPPY WITH THAT ,EXTREMELY RIDICULOUS
customer_reviews.author: BOURNE

customer_reviews.title: Great price and a great set.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I need new screwdrivers. I like the fact it has plenty of interchangeable tips and a nice heavy duty case. You already know it's a great brand. Great for apartment living as I don't have a ton of extra room.
customer_reviews.author: Jp

customer_reviews.title: Good kit, case is huge
customer_reviews.text: Good set, but dewalt cases seem huge. I’ve gotten where I just expect to need to find alternate storage method if I want these dewalt kits in mobile tool boxes
customer_reviews.author: Barry Marks

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Must have for a man’s toolbox.
customer_reviews.text: I needed this to fix my bicycle tire. This was an overkill for the job, but it’s such good quality. I will be using it for any maintenance on my car tires too. It’s very well packaged and is super sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Amit K

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product (as usual)
customer_reviews.text: I'm just a home project guy but I love DeWalt. In this day and age, thank you for making and selling quality products!!!!
customer_reviews.author: John Curcio

customer_reviews.title: Bought two
customer_reviews.text: gift to my son who was moving out of state. The other set was a gift to my son in law, had just bought a house and he really appreciated the tools and the case.
customer_reviews.author: mv

customer_reviews.title: If you're thinking about this set.......do it!
customer_reviews.text: This set is perfect for the home do-it-yourselfer. I do all my own motorcycle upgrades and general maintenance and I love having this set at my disposal. Having everything in one clearly divided case makes using the set simple. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Dave J

customer_reviews.title: Great socket set for the money
customer_reviews.text: Great minimal set for those looking to have a basic socket set. Comes in a nice case that is pretty durable, the layout of the sockets is nice and the inclusion of the accessories is also a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Big Yoshi

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with this purchase.Quality is really good.Happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: LA

customer_reviews.title: Good Seller, Terrible Product
customer_reviews.text: The seller CPO is really good. But the product is not. This is not a magnetic screwdriver and the bits does not stay in place in the holder during operation. The handle is too short, not ergonomics and I have a blister after assembly of a desk. This is not good value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel A.

customer_reviews.title: Solid tools and case.
customer_reviews.text: Ratchet nice and tight. Nice “trunk” set with metric and std sockets. Good price point. Was able to stash screw drivers and pliers under socket tray. Dewalt seems to put their name on solid products.
customer_reviews.author: GH

customer_reviews.title: Good tools
customer_reviews.text: The tools are great, they feel good and enough for DIY around the house/car. They appear to be of good quality and enjoy using them. Worth more than price I paid for. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: FTC

customer_reviews.title: Solid set. Great that you can stack with other DeWalt sets.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent set. I've now purchased several other DeWalt sets like this for different sizes. I like that they all can attach to each other in a stack. It does get a little heavy when you add 3 or more, but it's great for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus Wickes

customer_reviews.title: Well Made and Good value for the money
customer_reviews.text: The set comes packaged in a sturdy plastic case. The bits are well made and have smooth, flawless finishes. I haven’t yet subjected any of the bits to hard use yet, but expect they will do fine.
customer_reviews.author: texas consumer

customer_reviews.title: Tool Man
customer_reviews.text: After SnapOn, Dewalt is my goto ratchet/sockets. Dewalt tools are serious problem solvers -Not Your HandyMan specials. Dewalt has an unmistakable feel of quality and reliability of professional tools.
customer_reviews.author: doorc2

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the money.
customer_reviews.text: It's a basic socket set. Seems to be well built. Definitely worth the money. Nice addition to small portable tool kit for electronics installer.
customer_reviews.author: TimK

customer_reviews.title: Good sockets good storage
customer_reviews.text: They’re sockets and they are well made. The carrying case is what sets them apart. DEWALT has always known how to make good storage for their tools.
customer_reviews.author: CalvinL

customer_reviews.title: My husband was thrilled
customer_reviews.text: This was a surprise gift to my husband and he just loved it. The first thing he noticed was the brand name and how sturdy they were and then he said I won't be breaking these like on the cheaper set I had.
customer_reviews.author: Eadie M.

customer_reviews.title: I use it daily.  Wish it had magnetic heads packaged though.
customer_reviews.text: It's a great nut driver set. I use it daily. The only thing that would've made it perfect is if it already included magnetic nut drivers. As it was, I had to purchase a set of those separately.
customer_reviews.author: evh347

customer_reviews.title: Great driver bit set
customer_reviews.text: Great set of driver bits . So tired of of purchasing different nut drivers and screw drivers, etc. This set has it all and easy to keep organized in a nice case.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Good Kit, Ratchet Seized Up
customer_reviews.text: The ratchet on mine has seized up with less than a year of casual usage. Swapped it out with an older Craftsmen unit that hasn't let me down. Still a decent deal for the kit and case.
customer_reviews.author: F Mac

customer_reviews.title: Too large for a toolbox
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set, but has a horrible storage box. There is no way that you would be able to use this as part of a toolbox.
customer_reviews.author: Zeke 4

customer_reviews.title: Cool little set
customer_reviews.text: Post Office sent the first one to my son by mistake so I bought another one Now we both have one. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: T. Sloop

customer_reviews.title: Dewalt, Dewalt, Dewalt yea
customer_reviews.text: Smile, Fan Boy, I mean fan MAN!! DEWALT how can you go wrong. Great price, great brand, great tools.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Barney

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Dewalt makes good quality tools. I've used these with a power driver and manually and they work great.
customer_reviews.author: Michael A. BynackTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Socket caps are very shallow
customer_reviews.text: Decentnset for the money. Socket drives are very shallow, not drilled out for extra screw length. This is probably the worst part about the set.
customer_reviews.author: N. Obie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tool set for the price
customer_reviews.text: There’s absolutely nothing you can say wrong about Dewalt tools! A+ quality from the tool sets all the way to the tool case is 100% sturdy. My favorite tool set to get any type of job done from my car to Appliance’s and home repair.
customer_reviews.author: DubNation

customer_reviews.title: great deal I'm going to reorder it again keep one ...
customer_reviews.text: great deal I'm going to reorder it again keep one at home and one at work if you buy it all in different sets it would cost you well over $ 165.00 well put gather great case.. great deal 5 *****
customer_reviews.author: Donald E. Lennex

customer_reviews.title: dewalt
customer_reviews.text: I needed a nut driver to remove the back of my dryer, not being a shopper Amazon had exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Mom-Mom

customer_reviews.title: No-brainer
customer_reviews.text: For the price and the quality, this thing is a no-brainer. I don't know why I waited so long to get a nice ratchet set. Stop being a leech on your neighbor and get one for yourself!
customer_reviews.author: cjj8206

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: When you get tired of dealing with the cheap ones that you just hope will work, get this set. Absolutely 1st class quality. I can't imagine how you could get a better set. It will outlive me.
customer_reviews.author: Here in the ATL

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: I've rebuilt an entire 1977 f150 with this socket set. It's been real useful and I've freed up bolts that took alot of force and the wrench is still working good as new. The 6 point sockets are very good too because there's no chance of stripping the bolt head unless you have the wrong socket size on it
customer_reviews.author: Hunter McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Worth much more!! But the Best Buy
customer_reviews.text: I had the first one I bought for three years. A coworker wanted to buy off of me for 30 dollars ( it was only missing a number 1 Phillips bit) but he still wanted it because of how valuable he saw it to be
customer_reviews.author: Trevor

customer_reviews.title: Great product great price
customer_reviews.text: My husband was wanting a good little set and this was a great product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Sparkman

customer_reviews.title: Professional, but very portable socket set.
customer_reviews.text: Really a nice, solid tool kit. I like that these kits can connect and carry smaller sets together so I don't have to carry a 200+ piece kit around the house. Inserts can be removed from the cases to put them into a larger tool drawer.
customer_reviews.author: kyle

customer_reviews.title: the quality is GREAT for the price
customer_reviews.text: This set is obviously a starter set, and is only contains the essentials, minus some deep well sockets that every garage mechanic has to have. However, the quality is GREAT for the price, and they have a lifetime guaranty. Highly recommended for a starting point!
customer_reviews.author: Mike Fuston

customer_reviews.title: I really like the storage boxes since everything is secure and organized ...
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had a change to use these but they seem really solid. I picked these up so that I would have a socket set on my boat should anything break. I really like the storage boxes since everything is secure and organized within. The boxes also attach to each other which is very nice and will allow me to better utilize the limited space.
customer_reviews.author: Derrick Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Must have!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product and excellent quality! I thought the box would be smaller than it actually is but that does not bother me. Very sturdy box as well.
customer_reviews.author: anastasiya

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Having the sockets in a sturdy an organized tray makes the selection and work process go fast. Typical of Dewalt these are strong and handle well. A bargain.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Beefy and well made socket set
customer_reviews.text: Set I use to keep in my truck for any on the road repairs. Nice case.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph S.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent set
customer_reviews.text: Dewalt quality at a very reasonable price, recommend this set highly.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: Seems high quality, lots of gears compared to my beginners set from my youth.
customer_reviews.author: ZRreviews

customer_reviews.title: Great quality solid tools!
customer_reviews.text: My husband just loved these! Great tools, the kind you pass on through generations
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Sch

customer_reviews.title: Good screw drive bit set
customer_reviews.text: Good multi bit screw driver set. Good collection of useful bit attachments.
customer_reviews.author: Big Tom

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty
customer_reviews.text: Christmas gift for my son. He pulled them out to look and he was very impressed how heavy they were.
customer_reviews.author: Bambi L. Piercy

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Definitely sturdy and worth its value. This is not cheaply made
customer_reviews.author: LA

customer_reviews.title: Nice set
customer_reviews.text: This turned out much nicer than I expected. It's also bigger that I expected. I has just about every kind of bit but not the security bits. That's the only down side if you need that and I don't.
customer_reviews.author: C. Nichols

customer_reviews.title: A very nice set. I like the fact that the case ...
customer_reviews.text: A very nice set. I like the fact that the case latches on 3 sides. This seems to keep the lid closed very tight and the pieces do not get jumbled up even when it's bouncing around the back of the truck
customer_reviews.author: Justin P.

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great starter set for basic to intermediate jobs
customer_reviews.author: ChefDanG

customer_reviews.title: Good buy at a good price
customer_reviews.text: Love this set High quality Nice box Works for a variety of tasks
customer_reviews.author: ken

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Great set for anyone! Really high quality tools! Lifetime warranty is great, but you probably wont every have to use it! The case they come in is really nice, and the insert is removal so you can put the tools all nice and organized in your own tool box!
customer_reviews.author: Alexandru Purice

customer_reviews.title: very nice set
customer_reviews.text: I really like this set. The ratchet is solid and heavy and the finish is bright and crisp. I will collect the whole series because of the stackable tough boxes.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality for $20.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set to keep in the back of truck should I need it. They are heavy and of good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Longboarder

customer_reviews.title: suprisingly good value
customer_reviews.text: i was surprised by the quality at this price point; vg
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Handy....
customer_reviews.text: Handy multi-bit set. I'm using it often around the house and love the variety of bits included.
customer_reviews.author: Don P

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs down.
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy. Bits don’t stay in the driver. Total waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Erik

customer_reviews.title: Great value.
customer_reviews.text: Best screwdriver set I've owned....of course over the last year I've lost one nut driver but other than that this was a great buy

customer_reviews.title: arrived in great conditon, all parts included
customer_reviews.text: arrived in great conditon, all parts included. havent used it yet but seems to be of the upmost quality.
